Example 9.4 (Feature Matrix for Second-order Polynomials)
For a second-order polynomial and N training points xn ∈ R,n =
1,...,N , the feature matrix is
Φ =


1 x1 x2
1
1 x2 x2
2
... ... ...
1 xN x2
N

